description.narrative: Ghana II - Access to Electricity Project: The $10 million project will test the most cost effective approaches to address the key constraints that micro, small and medium enterprises in markets and economic enclaves face in obtaining safe and legal access to electricity. This small project is designed to be innovative; it will test several different interventions aimed at reducing critical barriers to legal connections for these businesses in a small sample of markets and economic enclaves and provide evidence of effective approaches to increasing access for the distribution utilities with the intent of facilitating scale up of those interventions in the future.

title.narrative: Ghana II Power Compact Key Performance Indicators
Number of customers assisted through outreach for electricity connection

description.narrative: Cumulative Output of Number of MSMEs assisted in any way by the Customer Outreach, Normalization & Facilitation Assistance (CONFA) consultant to acquire formal electrical connection
